title: Nine Inch Nails - "Liar" (Fan/Single)
description:
Another Single from ETS. This one is for the song "Reptile" from the album entitled "The Downward Spiral". This single runs a little long, but I felt it necessary to include the official remixes. It is a nice listen. I also had to include the track with Peter Murphy cause the track is so unique and beautiful. I really enjoyed putting this together. 

Nine Inch Nails - "Liar" (Fan/Single)

1. Reptile [6:52] 
2. Reptile (Reptiel, by Pieter Boon) [3:34] 
3. Liar (Reptile Demo) [6:58] 
4. Reptilian (remixed by Dave Ogilvie) [8:40] 
5. Underneath The Skin [7:16] 
6. Reptile (Virgos Merlot Mix by The Industrial Lord of Sounzz) [6:48] 
7. Reptile (feat. Peter Murphy) [8:05] 
8. Reptile (Live at Woodstock &#039;94) [4:01] 


ETS FAN SINGLES:

1_All_the_Flesh
2_Something_Blue
3_So_Far_Away
4_"Liar"
